company_info.name: Stockton Walbevck
company_info.product_description: Course Creator 360 is a course creation platform that allows you to create and sell courses online.

target_audience.desires: To learn new skills, gain knowledge, become an expert in a particular subject and/or topic.
target_audience.pains: A lack of access to high-quality education, time constraints, and limited resources.
target_audience.target_demographic: Individuals of all ages and backgrounds, with a particular focus on entrepreneurs and professionals.
